H0.text: when did they stop putting lead in paint. 1978

H1.text: when did they stop putting lead in paint. 1960

H2.text: when did they stop putting lead in paint. 1985

H3.text: when did they stop putting lead in paint. 1992

A4.text: Lead paint has been banned from household paints in the United States since 1978

A5.text: In the United Kingdom, lead paint was banned from sale to the general public in 1992, except for specialist uses.

A6.text: Initial lead paint abatement regulations under TSCA in 1996
